newsitem.title: JAPAN: JGBs end a tad higher after paring most gains.
newsitem.headline: JGBs end a tad higher after paring most gains.

text.p: *Key June JGB futures ended slightly higher.

*Comments by the chairman of the Japan Association of Corporate Executives, which said that interest rates may rise once economic conditions for April-June period become clear, invited selling and took JGBs off highs, traders said.
